column3: Allows the handling of real-time streamed audio data from clients.
Stores Eva conversation data in MongoDB.
The default Eva voice recognition implementation.
Repeats everything you send to Eva.
Uses the gTTS python library to generate speech for Eva.
Gives plugins access to intent parsing through the context object.
All log messages get saved to MongoDB.
Enables the response of weather-related queries from Eva.
Configure and monitor Eva through a web user interface.
Adds a way of viewing and partaking in conversations with Eva through the Web UI.
Allows your to interact with Eva through the Web UI.
Adds a way of viewing logs from the Web UI.
Adds a way of enabling and disabling plugins through the Web UI.
Adds a way of updating plugins in the Web UI.
